website_summaries.verdict: Simply put, this is the finest networked audio streamer we've ever seen. It's easy to use, beautifully designed and packed with features to an almost ludicrous extent
cons: No support for DRMed WMA files

customer_reviews.title: Years Ahead of Its Time
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech (really SlimDevices) family of products were light-years ahead of their time. Relatively easy to set up and maintain, technically accurate in sound reproduction, and and tremendously useful. And the Boom Player is no exception, although it's just not as perfect a LAN music distribution platform as the Touch. Still, it's easy to set up, its sound quality is fairly good (it's even better when you add a subwoofer!), and it's still a useful device, something like 15 years after the original SlimDevices Duet device was introduced in the market. It's a tragedy you can't buy these things new today; I still use them every day for music distribution over our local LAN.
customer_reviews.author: daplath

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Internet radio device!
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality. Finely polished surface and although a modest device, is quote heavy for its size so you know Logitech has used some quality materials in its construction. Getting it to work initially and after you moved wifi networks can be a bit of a pain and I found that factory reset is the way to go in such cases. Half a star off for this. The sound is amazing. Very competent bass. It is indeed a mystery why Logitech chose to discontinue this superior product. The good stuff always gets the boot (think Kinect for Xbox).
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Joseph K

customer_reviews.title: A great one of a kind Wi-Fi radio. It has a problem the plug in power cord goes bad.
customer_reviews.text: A one of a kind radio Wi-Fi unit from Logitech the only bad thing about this book box is the product line ended to soon. It is such a fine unit thank you Logitech for once awhile ago to produce such a thing. You can still get help from the tech help phone line.
customer_reviews.author: michael Labadie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound !
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt a great sounding unit, the stereo sound is amazing. Heavy bass, treble, set it the way you want it and sit back. As others had said, it is a pain to setup, of course I don’t read directions all that well so I could be the problem. All in all this is a fantastic item for Internet radio and many ad free stations don’t hurt either. I paid much more a few years ago for mine but have not had a problem at all. Good investment in my book ...
customer_reviews.author: K. G. D

customer_reviews.title: My Third Squeezebox Boom
customer_reviews.text: I just received my third Squeezebox Boom. This one goes in the Den, with one already in the Kitchen and the other one at my office. I also have second and third generation Squeezeboxes which were originally made by Slim Devices, before they were purchased by Logitech. They are in the Master Bedroom, Living Room and Family Room. Initially, I was a little apprehensive about the Logitech buyout, but after I bought my first Boom, I felt confident that Logitech was getting it right (so far). My only hope is that Logitech continues to expand and improve the Squeezebox line. As for me, all I can say that for the money, what this great device can do is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Marchwind1949

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to access internet radio and music on server
customer_reviews.text: Setup took about 45 minutes, figuring it out as I went. Quickly found music on HP server - I had loaded software on server before receiving the Boombox. Got connected to my Pandora account fairly quickly. Wireless setup fairly painless once I figured out how to enter WEP info.. Controls not intuitive...to me. Enhanced sound mode quite effective. We're happy with this portable access to alot of music - very nice sound for its size. It would be nice if there was an external battery pack available. Better written documentation for setup would have been a big help. Now.... I think I'll go plug it in and practice a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: A little on the expensive side, but it does what I need very well - I listen to internet radio, Pandora and the music files on my main PC. The sound quality is good, especially for the size. The learning curve for using the device was a bit steeper than I'd like, and some of the controls are not exactly intuitive (big black rotary dial is for volume, right? Wrong!), but once learned it's pretty good. Not fond of the Logitech Squeezecenter software running on my main PC. It's the easiest way to set up the Squeezebox, but it's a memory hog and spends too much time clogging up my admittedly slow DSL connection.
customer_reviews.author: M. Soar

customer_reviews.title: It’s the ultimate clock
customer_reviews.text: It’s the ultimate clock. It is made for the bed side.* You can hear, even in the lowest volume, every bass detail and also a very clear all-digital sound. *If you play it loud you can easily damage the speakers because of the rich bass. It happen very often and the replacements in the internet are mostly the speakers. I bought it as “new” from “amazon market place” but well, it was open ... !!! It’s so good that I would like to buy again but this time I will prefer the eBay and the (brant new, unused, UNOPENED ...) option, even it’s more expensive because it’s more reliable there. That's why the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolaos Kalampalikis

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of logitech. Their products are normally ver good quality and easy to operate. I set up the software and radio in about 30-40min. Took a little wile to import 40gb of MP3 files. Remote is nice (has a magnet to stay on top of unit) Menus are easy to navigate. Sound is REALLY GOOD for a small tabletop unit. I have in a large bedroom (20' x 32') It is loud and clear. Has a sleep function and auto dimming at night. This is the first streaming unit I have tried, but I think it's a great product. Get one, you will surprised how good this works AND sound. MW
customer_reviews.author: Mark w

customer_reviews.title: The future of radio
customer_reviews.text: This product cuts the cord between internet based music and radio and your computer. For the past several years, the internet has provided an unbelievable selection of radio stations and music services. The only problem was, who want to sit in frot of a computer to listen to music. This product works with your wireless router to pick up music and radio from the internet and let you listen to it anywhere you want. Setup is farily easy if you know anything at all about wireless networking. The sound quality is very good. I would recommend this product to anyone that wants to take there internet music away from the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Music junkee

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe the Squeezebox Boom has been discontinued!  Logitech needs to bring this one back!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this product was discontinued by the manufacturer. I don't want to have to be attached to my phone to stream Pandora through a system; there is a huge hole in the marketplace now since this all-in-one network product is no longer available. I have three that are synched in my house and want a couple more. It is so nice to be able to listen to different music sources in each room, or to have them all play as one system. This needs to be brought back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox Boom
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. I've never heard a small radio sound so rich. Easy set up to home network, add apps/favorites. No messing with setting time (automatic). A little learning curve using the scroll wheel to go through menus but once you play with it for a while you get it and it makes sense. You can just about change any setting and customize the Squeezebox to work/sound/display the way you want it to. Overall an awesome job by Logitech, they pretty much though of everything when designing this (dare I say) "clock radio"...it's so much more than a clock radio.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeCT

customer_reviews.title: Read the warranty first!!!
customer_reviews.text: This probably will mean nothing to anyone at this time; However it WILL show you how very poor dealing with Logitech can be. I bought this item in 2010. It has never moved since I bought It failed. The display is unreadable. Logitech would not repair the item at any cost. They have no new units available. They have no refurbished units available. I am an Electronic Technician and can repair it IF I HAD THE PART. Logitech says they do not stock ANY parts for it. So, it amounts to me having to throw a beautiful item in the trash!! That is just NOT RIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Buyer in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have the smaller squeeze box version and I love that one as well. The integrated speakers produce really good sound. We use this all around our house and backyard. Linking this unit to our wireless system was really easy. Several really cool features: Magnetic remote, we have it on a metal pole for easy reach. The display automatically dims so as to not keep you awake at night. The Squeezecenter program is great to help manage the music. We use our Squeezebox boom mostly to play Pandora([...]), which is the best free music I have found.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but Rhapsody no longer working properly
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound out of the Squeezebox Boom. However, the last few months Rhapsody is not working properly on the device. Logitech support asked me to contact Rhapsody. However, I also own a Squeezebox Radio on which Rhapsody works great. So this leads me to believe that it is the device and not a Rhapsody problem. Either the Rhapsody app needs to be updated or the device firmware needs to be updated to fix those issues. Songs will sometimes stop in the middle and no sound comes out. It is an expensive product so I would recommend you make sure you will not have those issues before you invest in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: DON'T UPDATE FIRMWARE
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had was, when I played it, it freezes a lot. Especially, when I played pandora, it just stopped and no buttons responded. I needed to return it 3 times to have good one. But the unit itself was not wrong. The 3rd one had same problem and I called Logitech Customer Service and they gave me solution. I downgraded firmware and all the freeze thing was disappeared. If you have trouble like me, call the Logitech and they will let you know what the good firmware is.
customer_reviews.author: The Shins

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and we are both enjoying listening to music from our IPod as well as Internet Radio, particularly Pandora. The documentation to set it up could be improved and I wish there was more information available in a quick format with tips for accessing radio stations, how to truly add Favorites. Sometimes it does not find the IPod music and then suddenly it is there so haven't figured that out yet. Mostly, I would definitely recommend this product if you enjoy a variety of music.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Wow Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit for my bedroom and very suprised on the sound quality of this small unit. Love it's ability to play internet music & stream music from my computer. I was able to download an app on my Moto Droid & now I can control everything from my phone anywhere in the house via wifi. I love this unit so much, I have ordered the Squeezebox Duet for my home stereo system & will update on how that goes. I just have one complain, this is kinda pricey. But I guess you you get what you pay for. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: I have been extremely pleased with the reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the Squeezebox Boom is a terrific audio device. Well designed, great sound and versatile, it provides audio entertainment anywhere you have CAT5-(cable)or 802.11g broadband access and yes Iphone, Ipod, any MP3 player. Additionally the Squeeze Network is an amazing resource for local and worldwide radio stations,and music services including Pandora, Last FM, Slacker, and more. I have been extremely pleased with the reliability, having had a chance to use it for a while.(Purchased on 12/12/2008)
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent internet radio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio mainly for a wifi radio to listen to Pandora. The sound quality is excellent, especially for such a small and compact box. Definitely up there with the Bose systems that I have heard. Took me about 10 minutes to get it setup from out of the box and connected to my WPA enabled wifi. Also the ability to completely control this through the mysqueezebox website is a very nice feature. Just today my parents where at my house while I was at work and was able to turn on music for them from the office.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Webb

customer_reviews.title: still going strong
customer_reviews.text: i bought this Squeezebox Boom 7 years ago. I still love it. It still produces clear excellent sound. Paired with Logitech Media server, it plays 192k/24bit high res FLAC music on my laptop while i'm shopping on Amazon. Too bad that Logitech discontinued this 4 speaker stereo model.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound in something so small
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this along with the logitech duet and radio. This has the best sound! Setup could be easier as you have to use the dial to spin around repeatedly and select numbers and letters etc. But once set up this is an amazing little system for a bedroom or home office. Once I had squeezebox server installed on my mac I was able to sit downstairs and play specific music upstairs (which is where this unit sits)..No major complaints other than setup could be somewhat easier, and the price point could be lower...
customer_reviews.author: ingeniusone

customer_reviews.title: Super concept, good execution
customer_reviews.text: The squeezebox lets me take my music with me wherever I'm busy in the house. I wanted it to access my own library over the home wireless network but the unexpected bonus is the internet radio via squeezebox.com. We have no good "oldies" stations in our area and my partner is tickled to be able to summon up oldies stations. Set up was just a matter of downloading the server software, installation was easy, squeezebox hooked up by itself and off we went.... Sound quality is very good for such a small box. And it works as an alarm clock as well !!
customer_reviews.author: P. Chaddock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - Would Be Perfect if Mobile...
customer_reviews.text: I don't often take time to review consumer products, but last night I danced a happy joy jig in my kitchen when this thing cranked up.. Really an incredible device. An ideal conduit for internet audio content of every kind, and the box (about the size of a large Kleenex box) puts out a fairly impressive wall of sound.. Super smart firmware and interface, cool tools galore, and absolute heaven if your idea of heaven includes having NPR, BBC, and Sirius in your kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: Tony P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox boom is a nice internet radio, but the recent UE Smart Radio is a better buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like this radio. Occasionally it "forgets" the settings and can be cranky during setup. I have been using it for a couple of years now and on the whole it has been a good purchase! I recently got the Logitech UE Smart radio and it is easier to set up, and definately a better buy for the $. I got the UE because I was pleased with what the Squeezebox provides!
customer_reviews.author: L. Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used for about half the retail cost (which is WAY too high, IMHO). The features are great, the sound is fantastic and the Logitech tech support is very good (even if it is in India). I was surprised that I could not find (anywhere) how to reset the unit to factory settings .. I had to call tech support. It is a shame Logitech discontinued this device!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Once you realize everything is sequential it becomes more easy. Not sure how to plug in the rechargeable ...
customer_reviews.text: Opens a whole new world to music. Everyone should have this stand alone internet/wireless radio. Takes time to learn how to use. Once you realize everything is sequential it becomes more easy. Not sure how to plug in the rechargeable battery pack. Using it with house current. I wanted it to listen to classical music and opera. Many, many stations available 24 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Knight-Perry

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezbox Boom - easy to set up - not so easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Setup was straightforward - quick and stable wireless connection. Sound quality from the Boom's speakers was acceptable to me, but not my musician wife. Playing through my sound system was a discernible improvement in quality and volume. Works fine as long as one stays in the same general area - e.g. "classical music", but uneven and not easily reproducible if moving - say - between a particular internet radio station and Pandora. Often takes a good five minutes of digital groping to find the path back. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: halwardri

customer_reviews.title: Everything It was Supposed to Be
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of the original Squeezebox, I was familiar with how quirky/frustrating the unit could potentially be to get set up, and other reviews hinted at this weakness. I have to say that I was literally able to set this little guy up with a sandwich in one hand while I used the other to dial into the correct settings. Since set up the box has performed without any issue. The sound quality is very good for it's size. It was actually a bit smaller than I anticipated, but perfect for streaming music into the living room when I don't feel like committing to the full Hi-Fi system.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I became interested in the Squeezebox after reading a review in a magazine. The review was spot on. This wifi radio is easy to use, easy to connect to the internet and sounds great. The menu system makes it easy to tune into just about any sort of radio station you can think of. I enjoy listening to distant stations to get a different local perspective from other places in the country and the world. If you are interested in wi fi radio, you cannot go wrong with the Squeezebox.
customer_reviews.author: chairman220

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Radio
customer_reviews.text: The Squeeze box has made life very pleasant. It connects to Pandora Radio and enabls me to have the type of music I have selected, with no ads. I have subscribed to Pandora radio. The music is the category selected, with variety, and NO ADS! My router indenified the Squeezebox and was connected quickly. The combination of music with no advertisements is terrific. Squeeze needs no additional amplifier or speakers (although a Connector for a sub-woofer is provided) to play.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best so far and maybe even the best period
customer_reviews.text: I have had other internet radios but this one is the best. It's really, really good. I wish it had an iPod/Phone connector but you can hook it up through an external input and included cable. It accepts Sirius but not XM even though they have merged. Other than that, it's perfect. The sound is very good for a table radio. While better exemplars may come along, it probably will be a while. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Compton

customer_reviews.title: Amazinng radio and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This radio exceeds all expectations! I didn't even know what internet radio was a month before buying this but was sick of hooking a laptop to the stereo to play Pandora in my living room. Once someone told me about internet radio it took me only an hour or so to see the Squeezebox is the ultimate choice right now for the money. The station choices seem limitless and the sound is awesome for such a little radio. Of course it will be hooked into a sound system for the summer party season and I can't wait! Don't waste any more time, buy this one now!
customer_reviews.author: C. Leskovar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite amazed by the quality sound this device produces. Setup was easy even with my WPA code. I wish the interface was a bit easier to use but I'm getting more familiar with it. Having a computer based (web) remote control is awesome - you can change stations and even turn off the unit. I'm glad I waited years for this device.....I'm not disappointed. I only wish it had a USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio S

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does everyting it says it will do. The sound quality is excelent. It allows me to play all my MP3s while still on my computer plus it plays every local radio station via the Internert. It can also play just about every radio station that broadcasts over the Internert from around the world so the selection is endless. The sound quality is higher than most small or medium sized boom boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Borkin

customer_reviews.title: The software of this internet radio is damaged. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The software of this internet radio is damaged. The device does not show the menu alternatives its should show. No possibilities to search for radio sites, No possibilities to organize favorites, etc. The radio cannot be used in any way!!
customer_reviews.author: Ton Roodink

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is our first squeezebox, we have since bought a second one since we like it so much. So nice being able to listen to our favorite internet stations, and the sound on it is impressive for such a little box. Occasionally it seems to lose the connection, but that could be our internet connection, not sure. Fairly easy to reprogram that, and overall we have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Salinger

customer_reviews.title: This Box Changed My Life!!!
customer_reviews.text: This box is AMAZING!! It really improved my life. (I've been using it everyday for almost a year). I use it with Rhapsody (only $10 / month), Pandora, Last FM, and some favorite internet radio stations. Rhapsody has so much music and it's easy to access with the squeezebox boom. The box is easy to control with touch controls, remote control, or with my computer (while i'm working). I paid $279, but it's on sale this week for $189. It's a bargain. The quality of the controls and the sound are much better than I expected. I use it with a subwoofer - which really makes a difference. Buy It!
customer_reviews.author: m-photo

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time, and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can completely control it from a web page, from the remote or from the unit. If you are looking for a nice small, simple, easy internet radio for listening to things like pandora, paradise radio, NPR or anything else this is the unit. NPR has almost all their shows on Podcast and you can set up the SBB to pull from these, its great. Highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a radio that could play some channels from Denmark and Germany. These stream crystal clear on this radio. I end up using Pandora, Last.fm, and MyMp3Musiclocker more and these are great to have on this machine. The interface is very user friendly. Setup takes a bit of time, but you only have to do that once. I love the device and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kr

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox review
customer_reviews.text: The set has a nice look, smooth and contemporary. I had to purchase a newer model router that could handle this technology and all my other wifi gizmos. Once I installed the router it "found" my wifi ssid and wpa key automatically. It fetched all my itunes music and had lots of other radio stations pre-programmed within, including a search feature to find non-local radio stations. It took a while to get familiar with the menu options, so I would say there is a learning curve. This was my first wifi internet radio.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Love this device
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. The setup was easy, the sound quality is very good. The user interface is a little cumbersome but not bad once you get used to it. I've only had it a month so I can't judge reliability. One drawback is that it is not battery operated but I knew that when I bought it. The pluses outweigh the minuses by so much, I may get another one.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, just plain cool
customer_reviews.text: Prior to my recent research into these things, I had no idea internet music streaming was available or so simple. If you've managed Wifi in your home, you can set this unit up. The sound is great (it is presently our only audio device in a 1300 sq. foot home). We don't receive radio signals where we are, but we've got iTunes and we have favorite radio stations from another state;and now we've got the music we love available throughout the house. Easy to use, and fun to operate remotely from the laptop. I look forward to a "real" music system someday, with a Squeezebox Boom in the smaller rooms. It's a terrific system.
customer_reviews.author: P. Houtz

customer_reviews.title: Great radio, but why the absurd price increase?
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about a year ago, and it's great. Nice sound, and the access to internet radio and streaming stations is nice to have. I was thinking of getting another, but the price is now about $230 more than when I bought it on a roughly $50 off sale. What gives? One star off due to the current price.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Love my squeezebox boom. Use it in the kitchen for music while I'm cooking. Like the variety of music sources available. Sound is very good for a little box. Use it most of all to listen to Pandora. Only quibble is that some of the controls are not completely intuitive - doesn't always do what I expect it to, but once I got used to the controls, don't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gutfeld

customer_reviews.title: Dandy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two Squeezebox booms, and I love them both! One is in my office/den, and the other is in the living room. This is really a high-quality device. Set-up was easy, and I had both booms up and running in just a few minutes. I don't use the alarm function, and I don't have a big music collection to play, so I can't speak to how well those functions work on the Boom. I use my Booms to listen to Internet radio (there are thousands of stations available) and to stream Pandora, Live365, etc., and for those things the Boom works very well. Sound quality is excellent for such a relatively small device. I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Best internet radio player so far
customer_reviews.text: Best internet radio player so far. Very good. Unfortunately it was dicontinued. Very bad. I own two of them and will probably buy a third one should I ever have too much cash lying around.
customer_reviews.author: German in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Better then anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The squeezebox boom offers more features, more stations with reasonably good sound quality than anticipated. Why pay a monthly fee for Sirius radio when so many music varieties are available free? Its compact, portable and a welcome addition to our home. My biggest complaint is the lack of detailed instructions. You have to experiment. Also set up was not as easy as advertised. I finally phoned technical assistance ( answered after one ring) and a pleasant technician walked me through numerous steps until it began working. This product is quite amazing and well worth the Amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox Boom reivew
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing. The only caveats would be that the sound is a little quiet for a large or noisy room (small speakers); much better suited to the office cube. Another would be the occasional hick-ups with the interface when I go from using the squeezebox software on my computer vs using the squeezenetwork. Other than that fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Fritz Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Internet Radio
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Logitech Squeezebox Boom for a month and I don't think I will ever get bored with it. It is fantastic. I use it all the time. The quality of the sound is great. I use it all over the house. There is no comparison between Internet radio and regular FM radio. The quality and variety of the programs is much better than FM or satellite radio. There is a good review of the Logitech Squeezebox Boom radio at [...] .
customer_reviews.author: Carlos F. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Squeezebox Boom was smaller than I thought be would be. It took just a few minutes to set up and start playing music. The choices are virtually endless. You can spend as much time as you want setting up additional apps online. Sounds great. We've used Pandora and listened to a variety of local and international stations.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The best xmas present ever!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present from my husband, and I just love it! I am amazed that I can listen to any music from around the world wireless. I listen to a lot of world music and the possibilities are endless. The sound quality is great for such a small footprint, and I rarely have problems with wireless connectivity. I want another one for another room in the house, hope I don't have to wait till next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Neena

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time & effort
customer_reviews.text: Set up was not easy, took about 90 minutes, but I'm not technically inclined. However, the music quality is fabulous, certainly room-filling sound. I've been watching & wanting this for about 2 years; the Amazon Gold Box special this past weekend sealed the deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky955

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: This Logitech product is very versatile and entertaining, you can pretty much listen to anything throughout the United States from coast to coast, I did not try to reach outside the U.S. but it does have the capability to listen to virtualy anywhere,
customer_reviews.author: John P. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox Boom
customer_reviews.text: The unit is smaller than I thought it would be. It sounds great for its size. I have only used it with an iPod and have not setup the wireless yet. One thing that I don't like is the fact of having to turn the volume knob six full revolutions to turn from all the way down to all the way up. There are 100 volume settings,this is a little much. A disc with a PDF file would be great instead of having to go out to the website for features and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great in its day
customer_reviews.text: Great for setting up a genre of music at parties. Discontinued. I guess iPhone/Android - based products like Sonos have superseded it.
customer_reviews.author: archer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I never do these reviews, but feel compelled to go on record as saying that i love this thing. I just got it yesterday, and within 15 minutes, had it connected to my i-tunes library, existing Pandora account and listening to radio stations from all over the world. And the sound is pretty damn good for such a little appliance. The only criticism i might have is with the interface. It's not entirely intuitive and takes some getting used to, but I'm sure that'll come with time. If you listen to music or radio on your computer, this thing is great. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Better than our Bose radios! Price is competitive for what you get.....my husband LOVES this radio. Small size makes it easy to move around the house. Understand it is being discontinued-grab one before that happens!
customer_reviews.author: doxie lover

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Device
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegant and a breeze to use. It plays my music collection (over 100 Gb), my Pandora stations and my favorite Internet station [...] Great room filling sound and an option to add a sub-woofer. I've replaced my entire stereo setup because of this small, powerful device. I think I need one for upstairs, as my wife is jealous...
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Better than Squeezebox Radio
customer_reviews.text: I own a Squeezebox Radio and bought the Squeezebox boom as a replacement. I am pleased with the reliability, sound and ease of use, much better than the Squeezebox Radio. Definitely the way to go in Internet Radio.
customer_reviews.author: EVK

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had considered buying an iPod dock, but decided instead to buy a Squeezebox Boom so that we wouldn't be reliant on leaving an iPod docked. Set-up was very quick, including getting it working with our NAS and it sounds great overall. We have the unit in a reasonable size room and it easily fills the space. Only trouble has been with streaming internet radio, but that does not seem to be a problem with the product itself. Overall, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: The Squeezebox Boom may be the best gadget I ever purchased. It is very well thought out and has very good sound. It's a little tricky at first, but you can easily set it up to play your chosen podcasts which you easily select with the remote. I use it to stream Pandora and several old time radio stations which stream 24/7. There is a well-laid out menu which lets you easily surf and select radio stations around the world. The on-line instructions need updating. If you buy it you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Peets101

customer_reviews.title: Boom rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic player like most from the Squeezebox line. I love the VFD display. Easy to see from the distance, unlike the tiny LCD display on the Radio. Seems to be discontinued, so grab one while you can!
customer_reviews.author: unclemat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office which is about a 700 sq ft room. The sound is amazing. Very high quality. And no problems with the wifi signal. I just think this is one of the coolest things I've seen lately. I love the randomness of internet radio, being able to hear new artists within my chosen genre. Pandora works great and I will be getting one of these for my home kitchen very soon. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: J Welch

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox Boom
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to listen to my music library out on my porch or working in the garage. Sound quality leaves a little bit to be desired. A little quirky to set up with no exsisting instructions. Overall a nice concept that just missed!
customer_reviews.author: musicman

customer_reviews.title: I love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, basically I listen to pandora on it, it's got great bass and hi-fi, I use it for parties and it's always a crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.author: steven g.

customer_reviews.title: excellent. no regrets
customer_reviews.text: the boom was pricey but i enjoy it. set up is easy but i did have to call customer service because i couldn't get my password to work so I had to reset the device. afterwhich, it worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: mico

customer_reviews.title: Great value in entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheaper model from AR and the squeezebox from Logitech. The extra cost is very warranted! The operation of the controls, more option in seeking internet stations and excellentt sound makes it a clear winner. This unit has strong clear sound and I found no reason to connect it to a home stereo. This is an excellent radio which has given me hours of enjoyment - you will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Great for any music lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to try it out, after having it a week I had to have more. I currently have 2 booms and a Duet. The Booms sounds awesome. The Duet comes with a remote, but I prefer using my Iphone or Itouch to control all the players. The Duets Battery doesn't last very long. The web interface is very nice, you have access to all the internet stations and music stored on your server computers. Great Job Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just like you'd hope
customer_reviews.text: Got this, installed the software on my machine running iTunes, plugged it in and it just worked! Very simple and intuitive and works seamlessly with iTunes. The only hard part was typing in the WiFi network password using the little scroll wheel :-)
customer_reviews.author: Arlington VA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I did a great deal of on-line research before I purchased the Squeezebox Boom. It's everything it says it is. I had the player set up and music playing within five minutes of taking it out of the box. The sound is terrific, internet radio works well, and being able to access music from my pc is a real plus. Very pleased with the purchase! Will likely order another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Connie D.

customer_reviews.title: Drops stations all the time
customer_reviews.text: I like it when it works, which is not often enough. It will sometimes play all day then freeze up to where I have to unplug it and restart everything. Firmware updates have made the sync function better, but it works less-well recently.
customer_reviews.author: Desertboy2

customer_reviews.title: When it was good,,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: ..... it was very good, but when it was bad it was very bad. Unfortunately it was bad every day. The streaming was interrupted several time each hour and had to be reconnected by me. Finally yesterday it went "pop' and gave out altogether. I liked listening to BBC and the sound was quite good. I am desperate for a new WIFI radio, but it won't be a Logitech. CNET notes the unreliability but doesn't downgrade the unit enough. It is very, very unreliable, beyond annoying, to the point that I would not recommend the radio.
customer_reviews.author: JATL

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a neat toy..
customer_reviews.text: Its like a world radio except, it brings the world to you. Pros: Great sound, fast setup, powerful web interface, powerful front panel interface, can be used with pretty much any free/subscription music service out there. Alarm clock function has a battery backup. Cons: Line in and out don't work that great. For the price, I'd expect optical I/O, but no. No internal battery for music.
customer_reviews.author: BruinTechie

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, brilliant user interface, great web integration. I'm amazed at what this thing can do. The only thing I would ding it on is the sound. I'm replacing a Bose SoundDock with this product, and although the sound is good, it's a bit thin compared to the rich sound of the Bose. If only they could produce a joint product...
customer_reviews.author: jsinai

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!
customer_reviews.text: WE LIVE IN A VERY RURAL AREA WITH POOR RADIO RECEPTION. THIS UNIT ALLOWS ME TO ACCESS LOCAL PLUS NATIONAL COVERAGE AND ALL THE TALK AND NEWS, MUSIC AND ENTERTAINMENT I AM USED TO RECEIVING ON MY CAR SIRIUS RADIO. I AM SO HAPPY. SUGGEST DOWNLOADING DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF ALL FEATURES.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K. Kubalak

customer_reviews.title: Squeezbox Boom
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to set up and a little hard to navigate through the menus, but what a great use of technology. Also sounds as good as the Bose system.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value.  Better than satellite radio with no monthly fee!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Sqeezebox Boom for about a month now and it has far exceeded my expectations. Sound quality is very good. You have thousands of stations you can listen to, and also services like Pandora and Slacker. Liking it more and more everyday and finding something new out about it every day. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Amant

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product as it does exactly what I expected. The boom is well built and is the perfect device for great background music in any setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dani L

customer_reviews.title: Super internet radio
customer_reviews.text: A great device, once set up. Can be challenging to get it up and running properly, but it is a wonderful piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chernoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget for your living room
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gadget. Easy to setup local and international stations. I listen to multiple FM radio stations from my home town in India.
customer_reviews.author: Jagan Jey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Support
customer_reviews.text: This product line (Squeezebox) has changed the way my family listens to music. Squeezebox + Pandora is a great experience. Easy to setup, easy to use. I use iPeng on the iPhone as an additional remote control (great experience). Easy zoning with multiple Squeezebox products. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Finally Receiving Radio
customer_reviews.text: We like to listen to radio more than the TV but live in an area where reception has been impossible, even for the large stations. Now we can even have fun finding new languages, interesting facts of the world and especially a consistent NPR. We have had it two weeks and the remote just died when we discovered the charger on top of the unit!
customer_reviews.author: Sam South

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this unit. Use as radio/ alarm clock in bedroom. Sound quality very acceptable. Set up to router was a piece of cake. However, the squeezecenter, and squeezenetwork were a little confusing to me. After an hour or two I was able to master them. Buy it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Makes Music Easy
customer_reviews.text: With so many different sources of music (radio, mp3, pandora) this combines all into one, making it easy to enjoy your preferences. I initially thought it would be very difficult to find radio stations from around the world. However, with an easy search tool on the device, I can tune into multiple stations in multiple regions easily. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wardle

customer_reviews.title: Great but could use more bass
customer_reviews.text: I love this little radio. It's super convenient and plays my pandora stations, local radio, iPod . . . only thing is the sound quality isn't as good as I expected (didn't realize it was so small). We hooked it up to an old subwoofer and now it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in VA

customer_reviews.title: A new way to listen to Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome radio. I purchased the SB Radio first for the bedroom which led me to purchase the Boom Box. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Truereview

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox Boom
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeds my expectations and is a wonderful music system. We use it as our main source of musical entertainment throughout the day. Exceptional product that works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Office
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas and its been a great addition to my office. It was relatively easy to set up (did not use the manual). Easy to find my favorite internet radio stations with search. I've had to reboot about once every three weeks as it will lock up, but no other issues. Sound quality has been great!
customer_reviews.author: deano

customer_reviews.title: i am very happy
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is ,i have a favorite new gadget in my apartment.. I got it on sale $167 you can't really beat that price.. Overall i am very satisfied with the product. The sound quality is not that great,but i connected to my home theater anyways... i would recommend to everyone who loves music.
customer_reviews.author: lenard takacs

customer_reviews.title: Pain of setup is worth it for Squeezebox sound and performance
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a giant pain in the butt because I didn't know my network name and password but once that problem was solved everything has been up to or beyond expectation. The sound quality is better than expected and no loss of signal has been great. Would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: squeeze box boom is the god of radios
customer_reviews.text: The best radio money can buy. I had been looking into hd radio, and I had sirus in my truck but neither can compare to this radio. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: to difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of what this could do, but couldn't get it to work properly. I spent hours trying to get this connected and had people with more knowledge of computers than me try too. We were ALL unsuccessful.
customer_reviews.author: oddmark

customer_reviews.title: Some Technical Frustrations
customer_reviews.text: Although unit was received within the timeframe promised, I was surprised how long it took given the fact that it was sent almost immediately by the seller. I can only assume that bad weather across the country was a factor. Unit was in good condition but remote needed a new battery which was difficult to get to. The name and e-mail address of the prior owner was not removed from the system which means that I cannot perform some functions until it is done. I will work with Logitech support to see if they can assist.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wisneski

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot WRONG with the unit, I suppose, but after a few hours of playing with it... it's just not at a good price point. I think at $120 this would be fantastic; as it is I'm returning it. And that shiny black plastic! Hard to fall in love here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cody

customer_reviews.title: good value - happy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this boom box, brings my living room to life with my favorite tunes. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: SQUEEZEBOX REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, the only problems you charged too much for it. A few weeks after my purchase, I bought two, right from the manufacturer for about $70 less than I paid you for your product,
customer_reviews.author: MALACHIHAML

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and the recipient tells me over and over how wonderful it is. A great item.
customer_reviews.author: margh

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox Boom
customer_reviews.text: The product functions as advertised. Setup was easy. Sound is good. Documentation that accompanies the product could be better, although there is more online.
customer_reviews.author: BFrank

customer_reviews.title: Signal drops most of the time
customer_reviews.text: I've had the boom for a year. When there's a signal...It's great. It streams Pandora and Itunes music from my desktop. But the signal keeps dropping unexpectedly. I have to restart my router and computer to get it back working. This is getting to be annoying thus I wont recommend this product. It's much better to connect an aux cable to my iphone to listen to Pandora than having to listen this unreliable product. If the signal drops doesnt bother you then by all means, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Budz

product_meta.title: Logitech Squeezebox Boom All-in-One Network Music Player / Wi-Fi Internet Radio (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Logitech Squeezebox Boom all-in-one network music player with integrated speakers. Plug it in. Turn it on. Rock the house! The all-in-one network music player that combines award-winning squeezebox functionality with an integrated amplifier and speakers to deliver your digital music to any room in your home. Enjoy the music and content you love, with crystal clear sound.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Logitech Squeezebox Boom all-in-one network music player with integrated speakers. Plug it in. Turn it on. Rock the house! The all-in-one network music player that combines award-winning squeezebox functionality with an integrated amplifier and speakers to deliver your digital music to any room in your home. Enjoy the music and content you love, with crystal clear sound.
feature_bullets: Integrated, all-digital amplifier and breakthrough acoustics for a big, crystal-clear sound that fills a room
SqueezeNetwork online music service for easy access to your favorite musicon Virtually Any Surface
Compact, all-in-one design with wireless connectivity for clean, clutter-free installation
True 802.11g wireless networking for optimal network speeds and more secure connection
A seven-day alarm that wakes you with your favorite playlist or Internet radio station

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars390 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
